content.text: 1 cup cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 cup cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped" )

content.text: 0) In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cook"@43:47 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "pasta"@48:53 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until al dente"@54:68 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot of salted boiling water"@6:41 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "rinse"@70:75 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( "cold water"@82:92 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-2 "drain"@97:102 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a large bowl, combine the pasta, mayonnaise and mix well.
2) Stir in cucumber, onion, ham and cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cucumber"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "onion"@21:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "ham"@28:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cheese"@36:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Drizzle oil and vinegar over top and toss.
